resources.string: Bit će kreirana tema na forumu kako bi ljudi mogli komentirati Vašu objavu
Ako je označeno, članak će biti navedena na vašem blogu. Ako ne, bit će privatno, u vašim nacrtima objava

plurals.name: publishedNbBlogPosts
plurals.comment:
%s is the number of blog posts published.
Appears in a player's activity feed after they write and publish a blog post. This notice is on the 'Activity' tab of the player who wrote the post.

resources.string: Još nema članaka u ovom blogu.

string.name: imageAlt
string.comment: You can add alternative text (or 'alt text') to describe an image in words, for the benefit of partially sighted or blind users.

string.name: imageCredit
string.comment: A field in case the image is not yours, so you can note/give credit to the person who took the photo for example, or other forms of copyright.

resources.string: Definitivno izbrišite ovu objavu na blogu

string.name: safeToUseImages
string.comment:
safeToUseImages
This is mentioned because the images there are royalty-free, so there is no risk of copyright infringement.

resources.string: Sigurno je koristiti slike sa sljedećih veb-sajtova:
Odaberite teme o kojima govori Vaša objava
Također možete koristiti slike koje ste sami napravili ili snimili, snimke ekrana Lichessa... bilo šta što nije pod nečijim autorskim pravima.
Molimo da objavljujete samo siguran i učtiv sadržaj. Ne kopirajte nečiji tuđi.
Bilo šta neprimjereno može dovesti do zatvaranja Vašeg računa.

string.name: blogTips
string.comment:
blogTips
This is a link to https://lichess.org/page/blog-tips. Appears when creating a new post.

resources.string: Naše jednostavne napomene za pisanje sjajnih objava na blogu
